name: @akashic/akashic-engine
description: The core library of Akashic Engine

scripts.prepublish: npm run minify && npm run doc
scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc -p ./ && npm run compile:cp && npm run concat:define && npm run concat:node
scripts.compile:cp: cpx tmp/tmp.d.ts lib && cpx tmp/tmp.js lib && renamer --find tmp --replace main ./lib/*
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test:compile && npm run test:jasmine
scripts.textlint: textlint -f pretty-error doc/ && textlint -f pretty-error unreleased-changes/
scripts.minify: npm run build && npm run minify:node && npm run minify:browser
scripts.doc: npm run build && typedoc --excludeExternals --externalPattern "**/node_modules/**" --excludePrivate --out doc/html/ --includeDeclarations lib/main.d.ts typings/console.d.ts typings/lib.core.d.ts

author: DWANGO Co., Ltd.
